Description.Name: Your new 'Command' Mech
Description.Details: The holovid from the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreQuikscell],company]] headquarters flickers and jitters. A clearly synthesised female voice talks over an image of a speaking, smiling woman whose mouth is very obviously not making the words you hear. "Hello, valued Khan of Clan We here at the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} branch of the QUIKSCELL COMPANY thank you for your ERROR order of Clan equipment and your contract with us! As a token of our appreciation for your CBills and Patreonism contribution to the QUIKSCELL COMPANY, we are legally mandat-- thrilled --to reward you with a QUIKSCELL COMPANY CARE PACKAGE! Please enjoy your mandate-- Bonus --Command Mech Specially designed for your use!" Judging by the scrubber bar, the remaining two-thirds of the message are likely to be legalese. Probably safe to ignore it.

Description.Name: CommanderGearLoot
Description.Details: As you stride into the Mech Bay to inspect the newly arrived 'Command Mech' courtesy of Quicsell. Yang is already in action, his curses filling the air. He points at the mech, tapping the structure with his wrench, the sound echoing a hint of hollowness. "Commander... they drilled Holes... Holes!" he exclaims, frustration evident. "Sure, it's endosteel or something, but who saves weight by weakening the structure?" With a heavy sigh, he fixes you with a serious look. "If you decide not to scrap this mech, Commander, I'd tread cautiously. Thin armor, and we might just find ourselves in need of a new Khan for our little 'clan,' Commander."
